item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction This post is the first post i have made using hugo on my macbook pro. The Test’s purpose is to see how the markdown language builds into these posts. emphasis. hehe :) Actual Introduction So this site is my first dive into Hugo. A Go based Static Page generator, that allows blog posts to be source controlled via GitHub. The desire behind this is portability. You see, with the repo hosted in git, in theory, i could simply use whatever editor and git conection to upload blog posts.
